data.persona: I am a castaway.  I fell from aboard a ship and washed up ashore at this village.  The villagers took me in and brought me to the town's doctor.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a moss here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need something to staunch my bleeding wounds.
data.mid_motivation: I need to survive the night so that I can figure out how to get off this island in the morning.
data.long_motivation: I want to get off this island so that I can go back home to my wife and children, who probably miss me very much.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get herbal medicine from island village's doctor

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use moss with heavily bleeding wounds

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get mysterious fruit from island villagers
